xwikidoc.title: MembersWelcome
xwikidoc.content: #** * Welcome text for welcome block on the members page * @translate This page requires full translation * @type content * @refactored ludovic *# The membership setting for this group appears on the group's Home tab under Information Settings. Groups set to "Open" accept all interested Curriki members; groups set to "Closed" accept members based on screening by the group leader. For open groups, visitors can view current group members below.
